接口的使用
org.apache.catalina.ha.ClusterMessage

  • 使用ClusterMessage的程序包 
    程序包 说明
    org.apache.catalina.ha
    This package contains code for Clustering, the base class of a Cluster is org.apache.catalina.Cluster implementations of this class is done when implementing a new Cluster protocol
    org.apache.catalina.ha.deploy  
    org.apache.catalina.ha.session  
    org.apache.catalina.ha.tcp  

    • org.apache.catalina.ha中ClusterMessage的使用

      实现ClusterMessage的org.apache.catalina.ha中的类 
      限定符和类型 类和说明
      class  ClusterMessageBase
      Title: Description: Company:
      返回ClusterMessage的org.apache.catalina.ha中的方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      ClusterMessage ClusterManager.requestCompleted(java.lang.String sessionId)
      When the request has been completed, the replication valve will notify the manager, and the manager will decide whether any replication is needed or not.
      参数类型为ClusterMessage的org.apache.catalina.ha中的方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      abstract boolean ClusterListener.accept(ClusterMessage msg)
      Accept only SessionIDMessages
      void ClusterManager.messageDataReceived(ClusterMessage msg)
      A message was received from another node, this is the callback method to implement if you are interested in receiving replication messages.
      abstract void ClusterListener.messageReceived(ClusterMessage msg)
      Callback from the cluster, when a message is received, The cluster will broadcast it invoking the messageReceived on the receiver.
      void CatalinaCluster.send(ClusterMessage msg)
      Sends a message to all the members in the cluster
      void CatalinaCluster.send(ClusterMessage msg, Member dest)
      Sends a message to a specific member in the cluster.

    • org.apache.catalina.ha.deploy中ClusterMessage的使用

      实现ClusterMessage的org.apache.catalina.ha.deploy中的类 
      限定符和类型 类和说明
      class  FileMessage
      Contains the data for a file being transferred over TCP, this is essentially a fragment of a file, read and written by the FileMessageFactory
      class  UndeployMessage 
      参数类型为ClusterMessage的org.apache.catalina.ha.deploy中的方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      boolean FarmWarDeployer.accept(ClusterMessage msg)
      Before the cluster invokes messageReceived the cluster will ask the receiver to accept or decline the message, In the future, when messages get big, the accept method will only take a message header
      void FarmWarDeployer.messageReceived(ClusterMessage msg)
      Callback from the cluster, when a message is received, The cluster will broadcast it invoking the messageReceived on the receiver.

    • org.apache.catalina.ha.session中ClusterMessage的使用

      org.apache.catalina.ha.session中ClusterMessage的子接口 
      限定符和类型 接口和说明
      interface  SessionMessage
      Class Description:
      The SessionMessage class is a class that is used when a session has been created, modified, expired in a Tomcat cluster node.
